Replace.Text: Tingshi may not represent much in other places, but it is an honor in Baiyulou. Master Hunyoumu will not be lost in his own path, and will continue to walk for the sake of us weak people. Whether it is difficult or abnormal, just cut them off. Soul Youmu-sama will once again lead us to the bright future.
Gensokyo - Underworld

After death, human beings will go through the middle way, cross the Santu River, and then accept the judgment of Yan Mo, and go to hell, underworld, heaven, etc. according to the severity of their sins. [NEWLINE]The underworld is the world where the innocent dead stay in the state of ghosts before they become Buddhas or reincarnate. [NEWLINE] Unlike the desolate hell, here is quiet and the seasons are different. Beautiful cherry blossoms grow in spring, and maple leaves turn red in autumn. It's just that the fish, insects, birds, and beasts here are all dead things, they don't sing, but fly quietly in the air. [NEWLINE] I heard that this place is so beautiful, there are many ghosts who are fascinated by it, forgetting to become a Buddha and reincarnate and stay here (×30 to become a Buddha, you will go to the heaven, I heard that the heaven is saturated, and the Buddha is restricted. ). [NEWLINE]This is the world of the dead, but recently caves have appeared in the barrier between the underworld and the real world, making it easier to come and go. The underworld has become a famous flower viewing spot known to some people. [NEWLINE]In addition, there is a big house called Baiyulou in the underworld. I don't know which continent's design was used. The house is surrounded by walls and stairs, and there is a Japanese-style dry landscape garden at the highest point. It is a very beautiful building.
Gensokyo - Underworld
Gensokyo - Underworld
oriental monster dream
Soul Youmu

Soul Youyoumu is a character in the official works of the series. It first appeared in Touhou Youyoumu, serving as the five-faced Boss and the six-faced Boss of Youyongmu. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] She is half-human, half-spiritual, a gardener of Baiyulou, and also the guard and swordsmanship instructor of the eldest lady of the underworld, Saigyouji Yuyuko, and she has the ability to use swordsmanship. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Because of his young age, serious and straightforward personality and immature character, he is a little out of his mind [Ghost-shaped Beast Omake], and is often teased by others [Yong Ye Chao character setting]. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] After Youyemon, she also often appears as an optional machine in the main work and fighting work, and has also played roles in official comics and novels. She is a veteran and popular character in the Touhou Project series.

Youmu's appearance is that of a teenage girl with a short height. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Silver-white hair combed into a bob cut and a black ribbon hair accessory. [NEWLINE]Pupil color varies between titles and may be red, dark blue, dark teal, or gray. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Wearing a white shirt, a turquoise jacket, and a black tie. The jacket has a pocket on the left chest and a white ghost-like pattern (eyes in the ghost beast). [NEWLINE]The bottom is a turquoise dress with the same white pattern along the hem. Wear white bubble socks and black shoes. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]The half-human, half-spirit symbol, the ghost half has a white, ghostly form that usually floats next to the human half. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] Carrying the long sword "Louguanjian" and short sword "Bailoujian", which are carried on the back when not in use. Both knives are significantly longer in the ghostly beast. [NEWLINE] The Lou Guan sword has a length that is not suitable for ordinary people [Qian Wen Shi Ji]. In some works, there is a cherry blossom pattern on the hilt and a ghostly fluffy white hair at the end. An autumn cherry blossom (cosmos) [zixianghua] is tied on the scabbard.
The land of the underworld is limited, so cut off all excess souls!
flow and silence

gate of hell

Gensokyo - a characteristic building in the underworld, located in the city center, initially unlocked. [NEWLINE]After completion, the city where you live will get +1 [ICON_CITIZEN] population, and you can carry out the "Accept Soul" project to increase the population of your city.
Souls entering the underworld need to pass through this building, but it is said to be a door, but it is actually just a concept with the same function as a door.
Prison World Sword "A Flash of Two Hundred Yojanas"
+2 [ICON_Movement] Movement for melee units, +2 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for each unconsumed [ICON_Movement] Movement

When moving at super high speed, even the very fast Shemeimaruwen can't catch his figure with the eyes [Benhuatie]. [NEWLINE]It seems that the two-sword flow and the ability to move at super high speed are also used when pruning the Baiyulou courtyard.

Netherworld

Gensokyo - a characteristic area of ​​the underworld, unlocked by technology projects, will not increase in price, provides standard adjacency bonuses for other areas, has area defense, and can conduct long-range attacks. [NEWLINE]All areas within two tiles yield production equal to the culture bonus adjacent to it. If adjacent to the city center, additional +3 [ICON_Amenities] amenity.

all-purpose gardener

Gensokyo - Unique unit of the Underworld, replacing Armored Warrior. [NEWLINE]Have higher [ICON_Movement] mobility, -5 [ICON_Strength] combat power, can move after attacking and attack times +1, [ICON_Strength] combat power depends on the highest value of the trained unit's melee [ICON_Strength] combat power (minimum 45 [ ICON_Strength] combat strength). Serious and straightforward courtier
I like a civilization where the people are happy, and I don't like a civilization where the people are unhappy.
Soul Yomu likes civilizations with high habitability
Soul Yomu doesn't like civilizations with low habitability
From my point of view, you are not a suspicious person, yes.
What the hell are you talking about?
I intend for us to fight back together, how about you?
Allies, hereafter we will wield swords together.
It doesn't seem to be anything interesting. . .
The truth cannot be seen with the eyes, and cannot be heard with the ears. The truth is known through cutting.
The truth cannot be seen with the eyes, and cannot be heard with the ears. The truth is known through cutting.
It seems that the underworld will also become more lively.
The enchantment can't be opened yet, please go back.
I think gifts are a necessary etiquette for important affairs, and I hope you can accept our messengers and good intentions.
You shouldn't be here, you should be buried in hell! (condemns you)
You shouldn't be here, you should be buried in hell! (condemns you)
I am Soul Youmu. I used to be a swordsmanship instructor and court master in Baiyulou in the underworld, but now I am the leader.
The passage to the underworld will be open for you for a period of time, welcome to come and play.
Got it, hmm. (Smile)
I need more clues about this world, can you tell us, we will have corresponding information.
Gui'an, what's the matter?
People are happy in their homeland, and I think that's the most important thing.
Water can carry a boat, but it can also overturn it. I hope you can listen to it.
This is an agreement, please sign it after you think it over.
Stop it, it's pointless.
No, shameless tyrant, it's not over yet, wait, if not for me, your legend will end in your palace.
Enough, stop, it's good for both parties, do you think that not enough people died?
Open up then, and we'll take care of it.
Don't worry, the time has not come.
Just someone who happened to pass by, sorry to bother you.
Your army has worried the residents of surrounding cities, please be careful with your words and deeds.
Is it too close, I don't think so.
In this case, I will urge my people.
Great, go embrace your victory, failure is failure, leave me alone.
Our money does not allow us to spend like this.
I'm happy with this deal, and it looks like you are too.
